mapper.select: select review_id, products_id, review_writter, review_title, review_content, review_star, review_img, review_date, review_hit from ( select rownum rn, review_id, products_id, review_writter, review_title, review_content, review_star, review_img, review_date, review_hit from review where rownum <= ( #{pageNum} * #{amount}) order by review_id desc ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_id, products_id, review_writter, review_title, review_content, review_star, review_img) VALUES ((SELECT MAX(review_id)+1 FROM review), #{productsId}, #{reviewWritter}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewStar}, #{reviewImg})
